TopicTitle: [1.2.x] [1.4 in Development] Real KSC in KSP Dev Continued

Articles.Content:
Hey Triston little side thing, can you add my picture thingy to the contributors list? Also if you have some of my textures done could you send them over Skype? 

Also great work guys!! Will be very hyped when this releases. Any kind of schedule Tris?

> 
> Hey Triston little side thing, can you add my picture thingy to the contributors list? Also if you have some of my textures done could you send them over Skype? 
> Also great work guys!! Will be very hyped when this releases. Any kind of schedule Tris?

yes I will add your picture. as for schedule wise, I wanted to get an alpha out at the end of the week but, I will have to ask liquidhype because idk if she wants to yet
BTW if you want KSC (Real one) referance pics, i know a guy:sticktongue:

> 
> BTW if you want KSC (Real one) referance pics, i know a guy:sticktongue:

um do you remember where I live???
Yeah but i know the (former) VAB director and head technician. He just left NASA and went 2 minutes down the road to Masten.

> 
> Nice crew access gantry! Will there be other ones at the other levels? Can it be retracted (hope so)? Is it optional? Not all manned rockets may have hatches at that exact height, but it looks fantastic. I've been waiting for this mod for many months and am really excited to see it coming along as far as it is. 
> Irrelevant: Happy Gemini 12 day!

As far as the SLS MLP goes the umbilicals and Crew access arm will be separate parts to facilitate all configurations of the SLS.

> 
> <iframe width="640" height="480" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen=""></iframe>
> [mlp](https://sketchfab.com/models/7a06144800274c42a9542213dc0a3a86) by [ArcturusVFX](https://sketchfab.com/arcturusvfx) on [Sketchfab](https://sketchfab.com)

This....makes...me...excited!
Anything I can help you guys with at all?

> 
> Anything I can help you guys with at all?

not at the moment, thanks tho ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
How close are you guys getting this to an Alpha/beta release?

> 
> How close are you guys getting this to an Alpha/beta release?

Soontm

- - - Updated - - -

I am posting this out of respect, no political offence or religion intended.

![CTujsdZUkAEo0a4.jpg](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CTujsdZUkAEo0a4.jpg)

This is going to be VERY computer heavy

> 
> This is going to be VERY computer heavy

Im removing a lot of the tower detail as it really wont be seen with the umbilicals on it. it also cuts the poly count by half.

It still looks great IMHO,I might remove and lower some more poly detail.

Tris can you respond to Skype plz?
Is there a download link I don't know about here? Or is it still a WIP?
it is still a WIP mod. A few of us have been given the privilage of having an early access to the mod before its release for developmental purposes.
It is ready when it is ready
